mapper.select: SELECT pd.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, b.brand_id AS brandId, b.brand_name AS brandName, pd.original_price AS originalPrice, pd.promotion_price AS promotionPrice, pd.coupon_discount_amount AS couponDiscountAmount, pd.discount_rate AS discountRate, pd.has_gift AS hasGift FROM product_display as pd, product as p, brand as b WHERE pd.product_id = #{productId} AND pd.product_id = p.product_id AND p.brand_id = b.brand_id;

SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.brand_id AS brandId, b.brand_name AS brandName, p.original_price AS originalPrice, p.product_like AS countOfLike FROM product AS p, brand AS b WHERE subcategory = #{subcategory} AND b.brand_id = p.brand_id AND ROWNUM() <= #{page} * #{count} AND ROWNUM() > (#{page}-1)*#{count}
SELECT promotion_price AS promotionPrice, coupon_discount_amount AS couponDiscountAmount, discount_rate AS discountRate, has_gift AS hasGift FROM product_display WHERE product_id = #{productId}
